name: Crystal Spinners (Xanderwood)
description:
Crystal Spinners

Part of my 'I remake your games' series on YouTube. Learn more..

Arcade style shoot 'em up. Defend your crystal from waves of enemy ships. Use points to upgrade abilities. Features 2 difficulty levels and a survival mode.

Devlog will be out shortly: https://www.youtube.com/xanderwoodgamedev

All artwork and programming created from scratch by Xanderwood.

If you use Construct 3 and would like to remake this game or see how I made it, you'll be able to purchase the game pack from my itch page after the Jam has ended. For access to all my art/music and game packs you can join my Patreon.
